content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe Trabelsi. Thank you for considering my apartment. I understand that you are interested in the rental price. May I ask what your budget is for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 300 Euros.

I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am dependable and responsible.

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

Do you have any other questions or do you need any more information before we can discuss the rental price?

Thank you for your time.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for providing that information, Nesibe. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe a monthly rental price of 300 euros is quite reasonable. However, I am open to discussing any concerns or requirements you may have. Is there anything else you would like to add or discuss before we come to an agreement on the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
There is nothing else I need to discuss. I agree to the price of 300 Euros.

Thank you for your time and for considering my application. I look forward to moving into your apartment.

Best regards,
Nesibe Trabelsi
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest, Nesibe. I appreciate your prompt response and I am glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 300 euros. I am happy to confirm that the apartment is available for rent and I look forward to having you as my tenant. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns. Thank you again for your application.
name: Heinrich Heine
